channel.title: How to make a Vbulletin forum
channel.description:
I don't know what section it is, this is prob the closest section to making a forum lol. If it is the wrong section, mods please move it ;)
[center][size=16pt][u][b]Rules of this thread[/b][/u][/size][/center]
[b]1) NO LEECHING! 2) Follow step by step 3) I am [b][u][color=red]NOT[/color][/u][/b] responsible for any illegal content, Loss of hosting etc. 4) You need a host with atleast 1 mysql database (I suggest www.webhosting.nationvoice.com) 5) Maybe more Rules to be added.[/b]
[center][size=16pt][u][b]Contents:[/b][/u][/size][/center]
Chapter 1) Information Chapter 2) Getting Started Chapter 3) Longest chapter, Mysql Chapter 4) Settings Chapter 5) Simply Zipping Chapter 6) Uploading and creating
[b]Chapter 1:[/b] [i] You are going to download a Nulled Vbulletin, it is illegal. But the Vbulletin admin's, mods and there company will only shut it down if it gets big and popular. With that many people they could donate to buy a legal Vbulletin so don't worry, i am not responsible for any loss/fines etc. [/i]
[b]Chapter 2:[/b]
[i]Download Vbulletin 3.6.5 from [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/19404998/vb365_null.rar] Here [/url][/i]
Password is: [code] www.clarksta.co.uk [/code] and licence is [code] vbnull [/code]
Extract, then find
[img]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/9122/configphpnewnj4.png[/img]
Config.php.new (In the /includes folder)
And rename it to
[img]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/1919/configphppnggv1.png[/img]
Config.php
[b]Chapter 3:[/b] [i] Go to your host (I done nationvoice) and click on Mysql databases
[img]http://img150.imageshack.us/img150/1541/mysqlgg0.png[/img]
Then make a new Database
[img]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/2678/newdatabasebc8.png[/img]
Call it VB
And it should be called something like "YOURUSER_VB"
Then create a user:
[img]http://img297.imageshack.us/img297/8265/newuserur5.png[/img]
Called it
User: Admin pass: Choose, Remember it!
Then you will have to link the Database
Make sure they have ALL privileges
[img]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/4627/addinguserwithdatabaseqn0.png[/img]
Then click "add user to database"
[/i]
Done Chapter 3 now! (longest!) :)
[b]Chapter 4:[/b]
Go back to /includes and open Config.php in NOTEPAD ( or notepad ++ ) or wordpad, I used notepad++
And fill in the Settings (the one's i put in black arial writing.)
[img]http://img150.imageshack.us/img150/1306/configphpsettingsvn4.png[/img]
Save & close.
[b]Chapter 5: [/b]
[i] Go back to the Whole forum folder, right click and press "send to ZIP"
[img]http://img76.imageshack.us/img76/9392/sendtozipat1.png[/img]
And upload it to your host, Click on the name and see in the corner "Extract File" , do that.
Once it is extracted, delete the old zip and rename the new file "forum"
[/i]
[b]Chapter 6:[/b]
Go to www.yourdomain.yourhost.com/forum/install/install.php and follow the settings, you will know what to do then ;)
[b]Credits:[/b] Me and M4G3OWNS(for Vbulletin 3.6.5)
[center]This tutorial is Copyright © 2007 Eyre-Sports. [/center]

item.title: How to make a Vbulletin forum
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

I’m pretty sure vB will NOT recognize. When you pay, I believe no history is left behind. The vB group will never know who you are. Little common sense? The only evidence is if they look at your files and there are changes, because I believe they do it for you.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a Vbulletin forum
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

awsome0:

does this work with myspace?

Umm, myspace? I don’t think you can because it consists of databases, and you would have to upload it in their site and make a database in their site. It has to be your OWN web, unless some free web hosters give free databases.

3.6.4 - 3.6.5 + vBulletin Skins:
http://bulletro.com/vBulletin%203.6.4%20-%203.6.5%20Skins%20+%20Skin%20Tutorial.exe

Files combined from others.
Credits to:
93dcthugs93
M4G3OWNS
Rum0

Amazing people.

Read full topic
